categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Hellencha was a Mirialan female Jedi Master of the Jedi Order. During the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire she was stationed on Ilum where she taught Treasure Hunting to Republic aligned individuals.
Hellencha appears only in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic as her character was cut from the game. Hellencha's file can be found on Jedipedia.
